entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McCreary
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
